summary: This is a small fix that I made to disable autosave when traveling to and from apocrypha in dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small fix that I made to disable autosave when traveling to and from apocrypha in dragonborn.

-- to install --

take the contents of "fixed script" folder and put it in your skyrim directory. if asked to overwrite say yes.

-- to uninstall --

take the contents of "old script" folder and put it in your skyrim directory. if asked to overwrite say yes.

-- info --

This is a fix for the autosave that occurs when traveling to apocrypha in the dragonborn dlc via blackbook.

-- notice --

you may have to reinstall this fix if you verify your steam cache

-- compatibility --

any mod that overwrites the script "dlc2bookdungeoncontrollerscript.pex" will most likely not work with this fix.
author: Dragonloverlord
